means: （即Timur）帖木儿（帖木儿帝国的开国皇帝，1336-1405）

sentence.Network_en: Timur was called Timur the Lame -- Tamerlane -- from a wound which left him with a permanent limp.
sentence.Network_cn: 帖木儿又叫跛腿帖木儿,一次负伤给他留下了永久的残废.
帖木儿的野心却在别处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Diplomatic Protocol between the Ming Dynasty and the Tamerlane Empire明与中亚帖木儿帝国的礼仪往来

list.abs: tamer 驯兽员, tamerlan 塔梅尔兰, tamer 驯者

means.word_mean: 1. Mongolian ruler of Samarkand who led his nomadic hordes to conquer an area from Turkey to Mongolia (1336-1405)

auth_sentence.content: Tamerlane's thing was building pyramids out of heads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tamerlane's thing was building pyramids out of heads.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tamerlane's thing was building pyramids out of heads.

auth_sentence.content: Mongol-Turkic ruler Tamerlane establishes empire with Samarkand as its capital.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mongol-Turkic ruler Tamerlane establishes empire with Samarkand as its capital.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mongol-Turkic ruler Tamerlane establishes empire with Samarkand as its capital.

auth_sentence.content: Tamerlane also said not to destroy hospitals and mosques, a small concession by a Muslim to the former capital of his faith.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tamerlane also said not to destroy hospitals and mosques, a small concession by a Muslim to the former capital of his faith.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tamerlane also said not to destroy hospitals and mosques, a small concession by a Muslim to the former capital of his faith.
